attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is embarrassing and a total waste of money - we have so much about Britain to celebrate, we have the Queen, the Big Ben, The London Eye... plenty to inspire some form of art!  So what do we want some technicolour broken swastica for?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
